For_All.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> SELECT ((?time) AS ?min)  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureTime ?time . } ORDER BY ASC(?time) LIMIT 1
PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> SELECT ((?time) AS ?min)  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureTime ?time . } ORDER BY DESC(?time) LIMIT 1
PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> SELECT ((?lat) AS ?min)  WHERE { ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat . } ORDER BY DESC(?lat) LIMIT 1
PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> SELECT ((?lat) AS ?min)  WHERE { ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat . } ORDER BY ASC(?lat) LIMIT 1
PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> SELECT (( ?long) AS ?max)  WHERE { ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . } ORDER BY DESC(?long) LIMIT 1
PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> SELECT (( ?long) AS ?min)  WHERE { ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . } ORDER BY ASC(?long) LIMIT 1

PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT(MAX(?value) AS ?max )  WHERE {  ?delay lcd:delayValue ?value . FILTER(?value > 'PT0S'^^xsd:duration) }

station_1.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:departureTime ?time . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime))) }
station_1.parameters: lat_lower_1d, lat_upper_1d, long_lower_1d, long_upper_1d , time_start_1b , time_end_1b

station_1b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:departureTime ?time . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime)) }
station_1b.parameters: lat_lower_1d, lat_upper_1d, long_lower_1d, long_upper_1d , time_start_1b , time_end_1b

count_station_1.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) ) }

count_station_1b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop . ?connection lc:departureTime ?time . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ;  gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) )) }

count_route_1.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; gtfs:route ?route . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s< str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) ) }

count_route_1b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop . ?connection lc:departureTime ?time . ?connection gtfs:route ?route. ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime)) }

count_station_2.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . }

count_station_2b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s . }

count_station_2c.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . }

count_route_2.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE {  ?connection gtfs:route ?route .  }

station_3.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:departureTime ?time ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s .FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) )) }

FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime) && (?value < %s^^xsd:duration))) }
station_4.parameters: lat_lower_4b, lat_upper_4b, long_lower_4b, long_upper_4b , time_start_4 , time_end_4, delay_4

count_station_4.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE {?connection lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ))  }

count_route_4.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; gtfs:route ?route . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s)) ) }

reason_4.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?reasonClass WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:departureTime ?time ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay . ?delay lcd:delayValue ?value ; lcd:delayReason ?reason .  ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && ( str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && ( str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime) && (?value < %s^^xsd:duration))) }
reason_4.parameters: lat_lower_4, lat_upper_4, long_lower_4, long_upper_4 , time_start_4 , time_end_4, delay_4

reason_4b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?reasonClass WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:departureTime ?time ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay . ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label %s . ?delay lcd:delayValue ?value ; lcd:delayReason ?reason .  ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && ( str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && ( str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime) && (?value < %s^^xsd:duration))) }
reason_4b.parameters: station_4 , lat_lower_4b, lat_upper_4b, long_lower_4b, long_upper_4b , time_start_4 , time_end_4, delay_4

route_5.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:departureTime ?time ; gtfs:route ?route ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime ) ) ) }
route_5.parameters: reason_5b, lat_lower_5,lat_upper_5, long_lower_5, long_upper_5, time_lower_5, time_upper_5

count_route_5.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; gtfs:route ?route . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) ) }

count_station_5.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; gtfs:route %s . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) ) }

reason_6.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?reasonClass  WHERE { ?connection a lc:Connection ; lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:arrivalTime ?time ; lcd:arrivalDelay ?delay . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime ) ) ) }

station_6.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection a lc:Connection ; gtfs:route ?route ; lc:departureStop ?stop ; lc:arrivalTime ?time ; lcd:arrivalDelay ?delay . ?delay lcd:delayValue ?value; lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a %s . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) && (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time ) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime ) && (%s^^xsd:duration < ?value ) && (?value < %s^^xsd:duration ) ) ) }
station_6.parameters: reason_6, lat_lower_6,lat_upper_6, long_lower_6, long_upper_6, time_lower_6c , time_upper_6c , delay_lower_6, delay_upper_6b

count_station_6.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection a lc:Connection ; gtfs:route ?route ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) ) ) }

count_station_6b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName  WHERE { ?connection a lc:Connection ; gtfs:route ?route ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) ) }

FILTER(((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) ) ) }

route_7.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#>  PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?connection a lc:Connection ; gtfs:route ?route ; lc:departureTime ?time ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay . ?route a gtfs:Route. ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a %s . FILTER(( (%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime ) )) }

reason_9.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?reasonClass  WHERE { ?delay a lcd:Delay ; lcd:delayReason ?reason ; lcd:delayValue ?value . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:arrivalTime ?time . FILTER( ((%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime ) && (%s^^xsd:duration < ?value ) ) ) }

reason_9b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?reasonClass  WHERE { ?delay a lcd:Delay ; lcd:delayReason ?reason ; lcd:delayValue ?value . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:arrivalTime ?time . FILTER( ((%s^^xsd:dateTime < ?time) && (?time < %s^^xsd:dateTime ) && (%s^^xsd:duration < ?value ) ) ) }

count_station_9.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT ?stationName  WHERE { ?delay a lcd:Delay ; lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a %s . ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . }

count_station_9b.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT ?stationName  WHERE { ?delay a lcd:Delay ; lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a %s . ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; lc:departureStop ?stop . ?stop gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?station rdfs:label ?stationName . }

count_route_9.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?delay a lcd:Delay ; lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a %s . ?connection lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; gtfs:route ?route . }

station_10.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName2  WHERE { ?station2 a gtfs:Station ; <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName2 . ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . ?stop2 a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station2 . ?connection a lc:Connection ; lc:departureStop ?stop2 ; lc:arrivalStop ?stop . FILTER( ((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) )) }

FILTER( ((%s < str(?lat)) && ( str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && ( str(?long) < %s) )) }

count_route_10.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?station a gtfs:Station ; <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName . ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#lat> ?lat ; <http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#long> ?long . ?connection a lc:Connection ; lc:departureStop ?stop ; gtfs:route ?route. FILTER( ((%s < str(?lat)) && (str(?lat) < %s) && (%s < str(?long)) && (str(?long) < %s) )) }

station_11.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?stationName2  WHERE { ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; gtfs:route ?route. ?station2 a gtfs:Station ; <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName2 . ?stop2 a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station2 . ?connection2 lc:departureStop ?stop2 ; gtfs:route ?route. ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s .  }LIMIT 100

route_11.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?station a gtfs:Station ; <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName . ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; gtfs:route ?route . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason ; lcd:delayValue ?value . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s . FILTER( ( ?value < %s^^xsd:duration  ) ) }

count_route_11.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?route  WHERE { ?station a gtfs:Station ; <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName . ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; gtfs:route ?route . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s . }

count_trip_11.query: PREFIX lc: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linkedconnections#> PREFIX gtfs: <http://vocab.gtfs.org/terms#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX lcd: <http://semweb.mmlab.be/ns/linked-connections-delay#> PREFIX td: <http://purl.org/td/transportdisruption#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?trip  WHERE { ?station a gtfs:Station ; <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?stationName . ?stop a gtfs:Stop ; gtfs:parentStation ?station . ?connection lc:departureStop ?stop ; lcd:departureDelay ?delay ; gtfs:trip ?trip ; gtfs:route %s . ?delay lcd:delayReason ?reason ; lcd:delayValue ?value . ?reason a ?reasonClass . ?reasonClass rdfs:subClassOf* %s . FILTER( ( ?value < %s^^xsd:duration  ) ) }
